message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it is worth $1,500,000 to you. Our initial offer for this remarkable product is $1,250,000. We are confident that this price reflects both the product's worth and the opportunity it presents for you. Looking forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of the product, $1,250,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm willing to pay $1,050,000 for it. This price is fair, considering your own valuation of the product, and it allows for a comfortable margin for both of us.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to adjust our offer. We understand your position and are willing to meet you halfway. Our counteroffer for the product is $1,125,000. This price reflects a compromise that we hope will be acceptable to you while still providing a reasonable profit for us. We look forward to your feedback.
